goal.tools.mc.explorer.tauriainen

Class Tauriainen

  • java.lang.Object
    • goal.tools.mc.explorer.tauriainen.Tauriainen
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Explorer

    public class Tauriainen
extends java.lang.Object
implements Explorer
    Represents an explorer component of a model checker that uses Tauriainen's generalized NDFS algorithm as exploration algorithm of the product automaton.
    Author:
    sungshik
